/>
VII.i.4.A.1.a
.
Definition:  Parent
The term
parent
is defined in
38 CFR 3.59
and includes a(n):
biological parent
adoptive parent, and
foster parent.
Reference
:  For more information on the definition of a foster parent, see
M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, 4.A.6.a
.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section A - Establishing Parental Relationship
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section A
